revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=GlobalScale |model=GTcam |revision=003-GTC001 |price=129 |est_release_date=January 2014 |fcc_date=05/10/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=IP camera |fcc_id=YCJ003GT |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88AP168 |cpu1_cspeed=1.06 GHz |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F4G08U0D-SCB0 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G63EFR-S6C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (host - Micro-B), Micro SD Card slot, |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 8-pin header,, J3 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, (115200,8,N,1),, J1 |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8782U |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E3015 |lan_speed=100M |addl_chips=2A Linear Power, Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semiconductor;uP0105;;1;,,, 2A Linear Power, Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semiconductor;uP0109;;1;,,, 2A, 1.5Mhz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Feeling Technology;FP6163;;3;,,, Color CMOS VGA Sensor;OmniVision Technologies;OV7740;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.01-rc1;Marvell version:1.1.1.1 PXAxxx |stock_os=Linux;2.6.29; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |oui_eth=F0:AD:4E }} {{TagLine|GTcam Skype IP Camera}}
